text: Jordi Morales García (born November 17, 1985 in Esparreguera, Barcelona) is a table tennis athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is class 7 player. He played table tennis at the 2000 Summer Paralympics, 2004 Summer Paralympics, 2008 Summer Paralympics and the 2012 Summer Paralympics. In 2004, he finished third in the Class 7 singles table tennis game. In 2012, he finished second in the Team Class 6-8 game. == References == Category:Spanish table tennis players Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Catalonia Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type Class 7
title: Jordi Morales García
